product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with dry pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: trim assembly: dry pilot, included: strainer, included: drain valve, included: pressure gauge, included: pressure switch, included: flame proof 3/2 way solenoid valve, included: air filter regulator, included: manual release unit, system: electro-pneumatic double inter lock

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved.

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: type: vertical, standard: ASME(american society of mechanical engineers) section-VIII part-I, bladder material: BUNA-N, included: all necessary valves, included: hydraulically operated foam concentrate control valve, included: fittings & instruments

product_entries.full_product_description: Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: concentration: 3%, feature: PFOS/PFAS free, specific gravity: 1.0±.02 g/ml at 20⁰C, pH: 7.0-8.5, viscosity: 1200 ±300 cps

original_rows.1: Supply, erection , testing & commissioning of Deluge valve with dry pilot trim assembly,fitted with strainer, drain valve, pressure gauge, Pressure Switch, flame proof 3/2 way Solenoid Valve, air filter regulator etc. & manual release unit. The valve shall be electro-pneumatic double inter lock system as per scheme drawing.
Supply, installation, testing & commissioning of CS Gate Valve as per API 600, class 150 with matching flanges complete with nuts & bolts.
Supply, installation, testing and commissioning  of Y-Strainer..

Supply,installation,testing and commissioning of Foam Sprinkler nozzle with necessary threaded fittings as per drawing. The sprinkler shall be Open Aspiration, Pendent type, K-42 with standard spray angle.End connection 1/2" NPT/BSP.UL/FM Approved.
Supply,installation and commissioning of UL/FM approved Quartzoid Bulb Detector for K factor-80. Temp rating 68 deg C
Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Ratio Controller.

Supply, installation, testing and commissioning of Foam bladder tank vertical type ,manufacturing as per ASME, section-VIII part- I. The bladder material shall be BUNA-N. The Bladder Tank shall be supplied along with all necessary valves, Hydraulically Operated Foam Concentrae Control Valve ,fittingss & instruments as per Technical data sheet attached with Tender documents.
Supply of AR-AFFF(3%) foam concentrate(PFOS/PFAS free) having sp. Gravity 1.0±.02 g/mlat 20⁰C  , PH 7.0-8.5 & viscosity 1200 ±300 cps.

Supply, erection, testing and commissioning of GI "C" Class(Heavy Class)  pipes conforming to IS 1239 with threaded or grooved fittings with  including cutting  pipes to correct lengths, providing fittings like elbow,tee,reducer and welding flanges to pipe, fixing with clamps to MS brackets / hangers, steel supports as per drawing.  Rate shall be inclusive of Zinc chromate primer over that 2 coats red enamel paint as per Fire authorities requirement over all above ground pies. Rates to be inclusive of  all complete as per specifications
